title: Anmooli
message: Happy birthday ishitii ‚ù§Ô∏é. Wishing you all the happiness and laughter in the world. From opening single's club in vit to being neighbours, from sansaar waale bhaiya to gol gappe waale bhaiya, from going for toefl to our dentist outings, our late night chai sessions to supporting one another in times of crisis. There are just so many kaands/stories. Ishitii is not just a nickname for me, it's an emotion.Kabhi  mere upar koi sitcom bana na too usmein tu pakka hogi üòú
